tool_description:
Fantasy Football projections and rankings, Includes weekly and remaining season projected points and rankings. Allows you to search PPR and nonPPR and narrow by position.

Used by https://www.fanfootballapp.com
name: Fantasy Football
title: Fantasy Football

api_list.name: Season Projections by Player (nonPPR)
api_list.description: Returns the remaining projected points for a specific player (nonPPR). Use hyphenated name and capital first letters (i.e. Patrick-Mahomes)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com/season/projections/nonppr/player/Patrick-Mahomes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com/season/projections/nonppr/player/{playername}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Season Projections by Player (PPR)
api_list.description: Returns the remaining projected points for a specific player (PPR). Use hyphenated name and capital first letters (i.e. Patrick-Mahomes)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com/season/projections/ppr/player/Patrick-Mahomes"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Weekly Proj by Position (nonPPR)
api_list.description: Returns the projected points for each fantasy football player for the specified week and position (nonPPR). Positions: QB, RB, WR, TE, K, DST
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com/weekly/projections/nonpprPosition/1/WR"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com/weekly/projections/nonpprPosition/{week}/{position}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-football2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Weekly Projections by Player (nonPPR)

api_list.name: Season Rankings by Position (PPR)
api_list.description: Returns the rankings of fantasy football players at specified position based on rest of season projections (PPR).

headers = {

        }
